00022 /**
00023  * @file   PmSumAdjust.cpp
00024  * @author Chuck Sugnet
00025  * @date   Mon May 14 11:45:08 2007
00026  *
00027  * @brief Class for doing an additive adjustment based on a probe that
00028  * may be hybridizing to another allele
00029  *
00030  */
00031 
00032 
00033 //
00034 #include "chipstream/PmSumAdjust.h"
00035 //
00036 #include "chipstream/ChipLayout.h"
00037 
00038 /** Constructor. */
00039 PmSumAdjust::PmSumAdjust(bool noMatchOk)
00040 {
00041   setDocName(PMSUMADJUSTSTR);
00042   setDocDescription("Add the PM intensities from two alleles.");
00043   m_NoMatchOk = noMatchOk;
00044   m_Type = getDocName();
00045   setDocOptions(getDefaultDocOptions());
00046 }
00047 
00048 /**
00049  * @brief Constructor that takes the list of probe sets to remember
00050  * the pm/pm pairs.
00051  *
00052  * @param layout - Annotation of probes on microarray.
00053  */
00054 void PmSumAdjust::setLayout(ChipLayout &layout)
00055 {
00056   m_Vec = layout.getPmAlleleMatchVec();
00057 }
00058 
00059 /**
00060  * @brief Constructor that takes the list of probe sets to remember
00061  * the pm/pm pairs.
00062  *
00063  * @param board - blackboard with various state to access
00064  */
00065 void PmSumAdjust::setParams(PsBoard &board)
00066 {
00067   DataStore *info = board.getProbeInfo();
00068   info->getProbePmAlleleMatch(m_Vec);
00069 }

00072 /**
00073  * Subset of probes that should be loaded into memory representation.
00074  * @param probes - bitmask of probes to be used.
00075  */
00076 void PmSumAdjust::setProbes(std::vector<bool> &probes)
00077 {
00078   // do nothing, probes should be loaded via probeset
00079 }
00080 
00081 /**
00082  * @brief Given a PM probe intensity add the matching PM intensity
00083  * for the other allele to the pmIntensity.
00084  *
00085  * @param probeIx - Index of probe in cel file data.
00086  * @param chipIx - Microarray or chip index.
00087  * @param iMart - IntensityMart which holds raw data.
00088  * @param iTrans - Vector of transformations that should be performed on raw data.
00089  * @param pmIintensity - Intensity of perfect match probe to be adjusted, may
00090  * be modified from original value depending on adjuster
00091  * @param bgrdAdjust - Background adjustment, if any, recommended (i.e. MM intensity)
00092  */
00093 void PmSumAdjust::pmAdjustment(int probeIx, int chipIx,
00094                                const IntensityMart &iMart, std::vector<ChipStream *> &iTrans,
00095                                float &pmIntensity, float &bgrdAdjust)
00096 {
00097   int otherPM = 0;
00098   float otherPmIntensity = 0;
00099   if (m_Vec.empty())
00100     Err::errAbort("PmSumAdjust::pmAdjustment() - Appears that chip layout has not been set, no matching probes.");
00101   otherPM = m_Vec[probeIx];
00102   if (otherPM == -1 && !m_NoMatchOk)
00103     Err::errAbort("No  probe for probe with id: " + Convert::toString(probeIx + 1));
00104   else if (otherPM != -1)
00105     otherPmIntensity = QuantMethod::transformPrimaryData(otherPM, chipIx, iMart, iTrans);
00106   pmIntensity += otherPmIntensity;
00107   bgrdAdjust = 0;
00108 }
00109 
00110 /**
00111  * Fill in the information for Self documentation.
00112  * @param doc - Self documenter to be filled in.
00113  */
00114 void PmSumAdjust::setupSelfDoc(SelfDoc &doc)
00115 {
00116   doc.setDocName(PMSUMADJUSTSTR);
00117   doc.setDocDescription("Add itensity of PM probe for other allele to PM probes.");
00118   // No parameters...
00119 }

00121 /**
00122  * @brief Supply a little how/what/why about the algorithms this
00123  * class performs and what parameters it takes.
00124  * @return SelfDoc
00125  */
00126 SelfDoc PmSumAdjust::explainSelf()
00127 {
00128   SelfDoc doc;
00129   setupSelfDoc(doc);
00130   return doc;
00131 }

00133 /**
00134  * @brief This static function should be overridden by child classes
00135  * to return an object of the correct type initialized correctly
00136  * with the parameters in the string, string map. All objects
00137  * created this way should be deleted when finished using.
00138  *
00139  * @param param - Map of key/value pairs to initialize the object.
00140  *
00141  * @return Pointer toCreate object, this should be sub casted as necessary.
00142  */
00143 SelfCreate * PmSumAdjust::newObject(std::map<std::string, std::string> &param)
00144 {
00145   if (param.size() != 0) {
00146     Err::errAbort(ToStr("No parameters for ") + ToStr(PMSUMADJUSTSTR));
00147   }
00148   return new PmSumAdjust(true);
00149 }
